alert.note: Alert for Cass; Ransom (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 23 at 10:24AM CDT until April 30 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Maple River near Enderlin affecting Ransom and Cass Counties. .Ongoing rain and snow melt has contributed to further river rises on the Maple River. Further rises are possible from additional rainfall today and tomorrow. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maple River near Enderlin. * WHEN...From this evening to late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. Little Moorhead section of town begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 8.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 11.9 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 9.5 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
